job description
The job description should be checked for completeness
and accuracy.
New tasks which are required for the job but which are not
in the job description should be added.
Task analysis
A task analysis shows the knowledge, skills, and attitudesnecessary for completing a task.  It gives the trainers a setof objectives for the course, determines the content of thecourse and helps the trainer choose teaching approachesand testing methods for evaluation.
